title: Charley J. Smyth Chair in Rheumatology Research
description: To endow a chair in rheumatology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus to honor Dr. Charley J. Smyth's contributions to rheumatology.
marketingContent: To endow a chair in rheumatology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus to honor Dr. Charley J. Smyth's contributions to rheumatology.
